title: Exciting Area, Easy Commuting!
posting_body: Live in one of the finest apartment communities in Austin!
Located on South Lamar at the center of Austin's most culturally vibrant neighborhood, residents are close to Austin's favorite entertainment and dining destinations.
You can choose from well‐crafted floor plans that include high quality finishes and stainless steel appliances.
Views are spectacular with the Austin skyline front and center.
Catch some sun next to the pool or read a book in the shade of heritage oak trees.
The fitness center is huge and well equipped.
Just a short distance away is Zilker Park, Barton Springs, Lady Bird Lake, and the hike‐and‐bike trail.
Shopping galore, culinary excitement and a hip vibe.
You name it, South Austin has it and this community is right in the middle of it all.
MoPac, Highway 71, Congress Avenue, and I-35 are all just a few streets away!
Quartz Countertops in Kitchens and Baths
TV and Data Connections in all Kitchens
Spa Inspired Baths with Framed Mirrors and Soaking Tubs
Full Size Washer and Dryer Connections
Vinyl Wood Flooring throughout Entry, Kitchen and Living Areas
Fitness Center equipped with iPod Docking Stations and Individual TV's.
Rooftop Deck with panoramic views of Downtown
Resident Lounge with separate Business Center
Close to a variety of restaurants, shops and entertainment venues
Close Proximity to Zilker Park and Lady Bird Lake
Large Courtyard with Pool, Grilling Station with Dining Area and Live Oak Heritage Trees
Easy access across S. Lamar via Two Traffic Lights
Call today, you do not want to miss out on this property!
Matt Davidson ~over 28 years of leasing experience in Austin~
I have access to over 1000 listings, and can help you with all your renting needs!
FREE SERVICE TO YOU, NO FEES!
